Mom answered. "Well honey, today I lost my job. As you know, we were already sinking in debt. Because of the loss of income, the bank is probably going to take our house and car. Unless..."

"Unless what?" You ask.

"Well" She continued. "I have a friend who's a scientist at a medical research facility. He's developed a new technology and needs test subjects for his first trial. The subjects will get paid huge sums of money..."

"Well thats the problem. The tests subjects would have to be you and one of the girls in the house. You would...err...have to swap bodies with one of them."

"WHAT? Mom that's crazy!" You exclaim.

"Well, I guess I could think about it..."

"Great! Well then. Your choices are: your older sister Jennifer, your younger sister Cassandra, Chasity your exchange sister from Britain, or me."

Well then...
